alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:28PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST CENTRAL COOK AND NORTHEASTERN LAKE COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM CDT... At 228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, or 26 miles east of Ely, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Little Saganaga Lake around 300 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Ensign Lake, Hudson Lake, Kekekabic Lake, Disappointment Lake, Thomas Lake, Alice Lake, Gabimichigami Lake, Phoebe Lake and Knife Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
